data_materi.content:
3. Cara Menulis dan membaca tanggal - British English -> Day – Month – Year
| ||Day||Month|Year| |------------|------------|------------|------------|------------|------------| |You write| |1st||January|2010| |You say| the|first|of|january|twenty ten|
- American English -> Month – Day – Year
| ||Month||Day|Year| |------------|------------|------------|------------|------------|------------| |You write| |January||1st|2010| |You say| the|January|(the)*|first|twenty ten|

Greeting (Kalimat Sapaan) --------------
1. Good morning (selamat pagi) 2. Good afternoon (selamat siang) 3. Good evening (Selamat sore / malam) 4. Good night (Selamat malam/tidur (diucapkan hanya ketika akan berpisah dan akan tidur)) 5. Good bye (selamat tinggal) 6. See you latter (sampai juumpa) 7. See you tomorrow (sampai besok) 8. How are you ? (apa kabar?) 9. hi ! (hai !) 10. hallo (halo) 11. Very well, and you ? (sangat baik, kamu?) 12. How’s it going ? (apa kabar?) 13. Fine thank’s. and you ? (Baik terima kasih. Dan kamu ?) 14. How is Mr…. ? (Bagaimana kabarnya tuan…?) 15. How is Mrs…? (Bagaimana kabarnya Nona …?) 16. Is Miss … well ? (Apakah nona … baik ?) 17. I’ll see you tomorrow. (Saya akan temui anda besok)

18. I’ll be seeing you (Sampai jumpa) 19. How are you going ? (apa kabar?) 20. How are things ? (apa kabar?) 21. How’s life ? (apa kabar?) 22. Very well, thank you. (Sangat baik. Terima kasih) 23. Fine, thanks. (Baik, terima kasih) 24. Good, thank (Baik, terima kasih) 25. OK, Thanks. (Baik, terima kasih) 26. Not bad, thank. (Lumayan, terim akasih) 27. Thank you very much (Terima kasih banyak) 28. Thanks (terimakasih (tidak resmi) ) 29. Don’t forget me (Jangan melupakan saya) 30. How is the family ? (Bagaimana kabarnya keluarga ?) 31. How is your mother ? (Bagaimana kabar ibumu ?) 32. How is your brother ? (Bagaimana kabar saudara lelakimu ?) 33. How is your sister ? (Bagaimana kabar saudara perempuanmu ?) 34. How is your father ? (Bagaimana kabar ayahmu ?) 35. Is your father fine ? (Apakah ayahmu baik-baik saja?) 36. Thank you so much (Terima kasih banyak)

37. You are welcome( Sama-sama) 38. Please (Silahkan) 39. With pleasure (Dengan senang hati) 40. Good luck ! (Semoga berhasil) 41. I hope that we will meet again (Saya berharap kita akan bertemu lagi)

Things at Home (Benda-benda yang ada dirumah) --------------
1. Ruang Tamu (Living Room)
||| |------------|------------| | Aquarium | Akuarium | | Curtain | Gorden | | Lamp | Lampu | | Sofa | Sofa | | Table | Meja | | Television | Televisi | | Carpet | Karpet |

2. Ruang Makan (Dining Room)
||| |------------|------------| | Plate | Piring | | Bowl | Mangkok | | Spoon | Sendok | | Fork | Garpu | | Glass | Gelas | | Cup | Cangkir | | Tea pot | Teko |

3. Kamar Tidur (Bed Room)
||| |------------|------------| | Bed | Tempat tidur | | Pillow | Bantal | | Blanket | Selimut | | Cupboard | Lemari | | Mirror | Cermin | | Clock | Jam | | Night Lamp | Lampu tidur |

4. Kamar Mandi (Bath Room)
||| |------------|------------| | Soap | Sabun | | Toothpaste | Odol | | Toothbrush | Sikat gigi | | Towel | Handuk | | Shower | Pancuran | | Water dipper | Gayung |

5. Dapur (Kitchen)
||| |------------|------------| | Gas stove | Kompor gas | | Frying pan | Wajan | | Spatula | Sudip | | Knife | Pisau | | Refrigerator | Kulkas |

6. Halaman Rumah (Yard)
||| |------------|------------| | Flower | Bunga | | Plant | Tanaman | | Plant pot | Pot tanaman | | Bench | Bangku | | Grass | Rumput | | Fence | Pagar |

Introducing Oneself (Memperkenalkan diri) --------------
||| |------------|------------| | Pembuka | Hi, Hello, Hi my friends, hello everybody | | Kalimat Perkenalan | Let me introduce myself, i want introduce myself | | Nama, umur, TTL, alamat, asal | My name is Tinuk. I am from Tuban, East Java. I was born in Tuban, 22nd Mei 1992. | | Info singkat | I have young brother, his name is Kukuh Prayogi. He is a strong and smart boy. | | Hobi, kesukaan | My Hobby is reading and writing. I like writing a short story and a poem. I have a special dream. I want to be a writer and publish many books. | | Penutup | Thank you for the time. |

Foods and Drinks (Makanan dan Minuman) --------------
1. Makanan
||| |------------|------------| | Fried Chicken | Ayam Goreng | | Fried Rice | Nasi Goreng | | Cheese | Keju | | Doughnut | Donat | | Sausage | Sosis | | Chicken Curry | Kare Ayam | | Satay | Sate |

2. Minuman
||| |------------|------------| | Coffee | Kopi | Tea | The | | Ice Cream | Es Krim | | Orange Juice | Jus Jeruk | | Syrup | Sirup | | Water | Air | | Milk | Susu |

Mathematics (Matematika) --------------
||| |------------|------------| | Integer | Bilangan bulat | | Natural number | Bilangan asli | | Whole number | Bilangan cacah | | Even number | Bilangan genap | | Odd number | Bilangan ganjil | | Addition | Penjumlahan | | Substraction | Pengurangan | | Division | Pembagian |
||| |------------|------------| | Multiplication | Perkalian | | Associative principle | Sifat Asosiatif | | Decimal | Desimal | | Variable | variabel | | Linier Equations | Persamaan Linier |

Professions (Pekerjaan) --------------
||| |------------|------------| | Ahli Bedah | Surgeon | | Ahli Gizi | Nutritionist | | Ahli Syaraf | Neurologist | | Rekam Medis | Medical Record | | Dokter | Doctor | | Perawat | Nurse | | Aktor/Aktris | Actor/Actress | | Akuntan | Accountant |

||| |------------|------------| | Apoteker | Pharmacist | | Arsitek | Architect | | Bidan | Midwife | | Desain Grafis | Graphic Designer | | Dokter Gigi | Dentist | | Dosen | Lecturer | | Guru | Teacher | | Ilmuwan | Scientist | | Juru Foto | Photographer | | Karyawan | Employee |

Shape (Bentuk) --------------
||| |------------|------------| | Lonjong | Oval | | Segitiga | Triangle | | Persegi panjang | Rectangle | | Bintang | Star | | Heart | Hati | | Wajik | Diamond | | Bulan | Circle | | Segi empat | Square |

||| |------------|------------| | Trapesium Trapezoid | Segitiga siku-siku | Right Triangle | | Lempengan | Plaque | | Segi lima | Pentagon | | Segi enam | Hexagon | | Segi tujuh | Heptagon | | Segi delapan | Octagon | | Segi sepuluh | Decagon |

Library (Perpustakaan) --------------
||| |------------|------------| | Reader | Pembaca | | Librarian | Pustakawan | | Book | Buku | | Reference Room | Ruang Referensi | | Discussion Room | Ruang Diskusi | | Guidance Room | Ruang Bimbingan | | Bookshelf | Rak buku |

||| |------------|------------| | Lockers | Loker | | Computer | Komputer | | Lending Section | Bagian peminjaman | | Returning Section | Bagian pengembalian | | Fines Book | Buku denda | | Library Card | Kartu Perpustakaan |

Weather and Seasons (Cuaca dan Musim) --------------
1. Season (Musim)
||| |------------|------------| | Musim Kemarau | Dry Season | | Musim Hujan | Rainy Season | | Musim Semi | Spring | | Musim Panas | Summer | | Musim Gugur | Autumn | | Musim dingin/Salju | Winter |

2. Cuaca (Weather)
||| |------------|------------| | Cerah | Sunny | | Berawan | Cloudly | | Panas | Hot | | Dingin | Cold | | Berangin | Windy | | Berkabut | Foggy |

Calender -------------- 1. Nama Bulan (Month)
| Indonesia | English | |------------|------------| |- Januari| January| |- Februari|February | |- Maret| March| |- April |April| |- Mei|May| |- Juni|June| |- Juli|July|

|Indonesia | English | |------------|------------| |- Agustus|August| |- September | September| |- Oktober| October| |- November| November| |- Desember|December|
2. Cara Membaca Tahun Dalam membaca tahun, biasanya kita memisahkan tahun dalam puluhan. - 1985 is split up in 19 and 85. (You say: nineteen eighty-five). Dari 2000 sampai 2009 tahunnya tidak dipisahkan. - 2000 = two thousand - 2001 = two thousand (and) one
Dalam pengucapan dan penulisan tahun kata and sering ditinggalkan. Kemudian dari 2010 dalam tahun dipisahkan kembali.

##### Bagaimana membaca tahun dalam bahasa Inggris?
|You Write |You Say | |------------|------------| |1900| Nineteen hundred| |1901| Nineteen hundred (and) one| |1995| Nineteen ninety-five| |2000| Two thousand,twenty hundred| |2002| Two thousand (and) two,twenty oh-two| |2010| Two thousand (and) ten,twenty ten|
